name: SOPHIE (GoblinWare, LLC)
description:
SOPHIE was developed across the course of a week as a Halloween surprise by GoblinWare, LLC, an independent game development group consisting of three people.  The code, music, sound, artwork, story, etc. are all original labors of love, which were plugged together in Unity.  

Specs, Technical, and Miscellaneous

Genre(s):  First-Person Horror; Escape Room
Controls:  WASD/Mouse - Move/Look; E - Interact
Estimated Duration to Complete:  ~ 10-15 minutes.
Compatible Versions:  Mac OSx; Windows
